documents.document: The only way to fix a friendship is to try. –Pooh
Do you want to build a snowman? It doesn’t have to be a snowman. –Anna in "Frozen"
The only way to get what you want in this world is through hard work. –Tiana (Princess and the Frog)
A conscience is that still small voice that people won't listen to. That's just the trouble with the world today. –Jiminy Cricket
The right things may seem wrong sometimes, or sometimes the wrong things may be right at the wrong time. –Jiminy Cricket
The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible. –Charles (Alice in Wonderland)
I will protect you from everything around you. I will be here, so don’t you cry. –Kala (Tarzan)
Things don't always go the way we planned, but you'll see every day that we'll never turn away. –Simba "Lion King II"
No one decides my fate but me. –Belle (Once Upon A Time)
We're curious and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths. –Walt Disney
Love is a river when you fall. It's the greatest power of all. –Cinderella (Cinderella 3)
When we work together, things are always better. –Pooh
The truth sounds insane sometimes, but that doesn't mean it's not the truth. –Linguini (Ratatouille)
I learned an important lesson. You can’t count on anyone. –Syndrome (The Incredibles)
The real treasures are your friends and family. –Woody (Toy Story 2)
I'll be there someday. I can go the distance. I will find my way if I can be strong. – Hercules
If only they’d look closer, they’d find out there’s so much more to me. – Aladdin
Sometimes failures lead to better things. –Monsters University
Just because you haven’t found your talent yet, doesn’t mean you don’t have one. –Kermit in "The Muppets"
\"If you are what you eat, then I only want to eat the good stuff. –Remy in "Ratatouille"
Tell everybody I'm on my way, and I'm loving every step I take. –Koda in "Brother Bear|"
Play it safe. Better to not know which moment may be your last, alive to the mystery of it all. –Jack Sparrow
Piglet: “When you wake up in the morning, what's the first thing you say to yourself?" | Pooh: "What's for breakfast?"
Piglet: “When you wake up in the morning, what's the first thing you say to yourself?" : Pooh: "What's for breakfast?"
Wake with the morning sunlight to find fortune that is smiling on you. –Cinderella
You and me together, that's how it always should be. One without the other don't mean nothing to me. – Monsters, Inc
I'm not lost for I know where I am. But however, where I am may be lost. – Pooh
People often ask me if I could tell others how to make their dreams come true. My answer is, you do it by working. –Walt Disney
I remember music and I remember love. –Ariel
No matter what happens to me, I'll always be with you forever. –John Smith - "Pocahontas"
http://t.co/08uBCfpoOq
Dream. All you have to do is think about it, work on it every day, and you'll get it. –Sebastian "Little Mermaid Series"
Just remember to smile. –Elinor (Brave)
Everybody wants to live happily ever after. Everybody wants to know their true love is true. –Giselle in "Enchanted"
Don’t take action without having a plan first. It doesn’t have to be a good plan, but some plan is better than no plan. – Pooh
When life gets rough, I like to hold on to my dream. –Olaf "Frozen"
Everybody seems happy. Why does the world have to be down on me? – Mickey Mouse
Please don’t go away. Please? No one’s ever stuck with me for so long before. –Dory in "Finding Nemo"
When we do fantasy, we must not lose sight of reality. – Walt Disney
Because I love you, I insist you run. –Olaf in Frozen
Don't let your heart be filled with sorrow for all you know tomorrow the dream that you wish will come true. – Cinderella
The real treasures are your friends and family. – Woody in "Toy Story 2"
Think, believe, dream, and dare. – Walt Disney
Let it go. You'll never see me cry. Here I stand and here I'll stay. – Elsa in "Frozen"
I am not exactly sure what I should do. – Pooh
I can’t get Minnie off my mind. I just can’t go on without her. – Mickey Mouse
Anyone can. That doesn't mean that anyone should. –Remy in "Ratatouille"
If I never knew you, I'd be safe but half as real, never knowing I could feel a love so strong and true. – Pocahontas
Just because you wish for something, doesn't make it true. –Tiana in "Princess and the Frog"
Think of the happiest things. It's the same as having wings. –Peter Pan
Hunny is sweet, but friendship is sweeter. –Pooh

Dreams connect us even when we're far apart because dreams come from inside your heart. –Ariel in The Little Mermaid Series
Did you ever stop to think, and forget to start again? – Pooh

Dreams connect us even when we're far apart because dreams come from inside your heart. –Ariel (Little Mermaid Series)

The way you laugh is just the best. – Pooh
Forever is a long, long time, and time has a way of changing things. –Big Mama in "Fox and The Hound"

Your talent makes you who you are. You should be proud of it. –Tinker Bell in "Disney Fairies"
Hunny is sweet, but friendship is sweeter. – Pooh
Cute http://t.co/fOVAPNE6Fk
Nothing's impossible. –The Doorknob in "Alice in Wonderland"
Good friends will stick with you until you’re unstuck. – Pooh
When you do the things that you CAN do, you will find a way. – Pooh
If your strategy isn’t working, try it from another angle. – Goofy
No words describe a mother's tears. No words can heal a broken heart. – Tarzan
Don’t worry. Everybody has problems. Everybody has bad times. –Phoebe in "Enchanted"
Even though life was hard sometimes, I tried to keep my hopes and spirits up. – Cinderella in "Princess Stories"
#Cinderella !! She's my favorite. This is my favorite disney princess story! http://t.co/d109kw9XiM
My heart has wings and I can fly. I'll touch every star in the sky. So this is the miracle that I've been dreaming of. –Cinderella
Happiness is a state of mind. You can be happy or you can be unhappy. – Walt Disney
If only I could promise forever, then we could just be we forever you and me, forever and ever. –Christopher Robin
I wanna be with you forever. I want you right here beside me forever. – Pooh
I heard "Frozen" will be released on DVD and blue ray on March 18 ! Get ready! :-) http://t.co/5cWfHhq0Zi
The most important thing is family. – Walt Disney
Don’t you ever stop dreaming. You can be anyone you want to be. –Travers Goff "Saving Mr. Banks"
Life is like a road that you travel on when there's one day here and the next day gone. –Cars
I am at war with myself. –P.L. Travers in "Saving Mr. Banks"
Absolutely. http://t.co/e0UPDb6fQq
Promise me you won't forget about me, ever, not even when I am a hundred. –Christopher Robin
A laugh can be a very powerful thing. Sometimes in life, it’s the only weapon we've got. – Roger "Who Framed Roger Rabbit"
When somebody loved me, everything was beautiful. Every hour we spent together lives within my heart. – "Toy Story 2"

Without Minnie, my dreams have become nightmares. – Mickey Mouse

Bad things happen, and you can't do anything about it. –Timon in "The Lion King"
Once you believe you are ready to shine, the princess inside you will show. –Sleeping Beauty in Princess Stories
It's just one of those days. Again. – Eeyore
